item.title: Authors Setup Guide
item.description: Engimo supports multiple authors for your site. Just make sure you have the following configuration in your site’s config.toml: [taxonomies] author = "authors" Engimo treats Authors as a Hugo Taxonomy. Author’s Profile For adding an author to your site: Create data/authors folder in your site’s root directory Create a file with the filename format: <username>.toml Now, add information about the author using the structure below: /data/authors/muniftanjim.toml id = "muniftanjim" [email] username = "muniftanjim" host = "gmail.
